description: This file defines a FastAPI router for music recommendations, including a GET endpoint that provides personalized track suggestions based on user events or fallback to latest tracks.

classes.name: APIRouter
classes.description: FastAPI object used for defining API routes and their associated endpoints.

classes.name: RecommendationEvent
classes.description: Model representing user recommendation-related events stored in the database.

classes.name: Track
classes.description: Model representing a music track entity stored in the database.

methods.name: get_recommendations(user: User = Depends(current_user), db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: API handler that returns a list of recommended tracks for the current user based on recent events or latest tracks.

methods.name: dict to_dict(t: Track)
methods.description: Helper function to convert a Track object into a dictionary for JSON serialization.

ctags.name: get_recommendations
ctags.pattern: /^def get_recommendations(user: User = Depends(current_user), db: Session = Depends(get_db)):$/
